definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Among them, the personal firewall (PFW) software is the best choice for personal users.
sentences.chinese: 其中個人防火牆軟件是個人用戶的最佳選擇。

sentences.english: Inside the firewall, there is no anonymity.
sentences.chinese: 在防火牆內部，沒有匿名機制。

sentences.english: A wall of fire stood before them.
The complexity of a jerry-rigged firewall will undermine its effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 一個偷工減料的防火牆，其複雜性將削弱其效力。

sentences.english: These clouds exist within the company firewall and they are managed by the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 這些雲在公司防火牆之內，由企業管理。

sentences.english: Firewalls allow for enforcement of the domain encapsulation.
sentences.chinese: 防火牆允許增強對域的封裝。

sentences.english: Filtering firewalls are more or less transparent to the user.
sentences.chinese: 過濾防火牆對於用戶或多或少是透明的。

sentences.english: This ancient fire wall can no longer take the full burden of fire-proofing.
sentences.chinese: 建築的風火牆早已無法承擔防火的重任了。

sentences.english: The fire-heated wall of his room was very warm, the curtain long since having been drawn.
sentences.chinese: 火牆燒得很熱，屋子裏的窗簾早早就拉上了。

sentences.english: Again, though, all in the context of firewalling time to make things.
sentences.chinese: 然而再一次，這是我們穿越防火牆的時機。

sentences.english: If we get another fw for the 5800, then great.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們得到的另一個5800防火牆，那也不錯。

sentences.english: You’ll need to Unblock or Accept any firewall prompts.
sentences.chinese: 需要解鎖或接受任何防火牆提示。

sentences.english: Update all non-Microsoft firewall and other security software on your computer.
sentences.chinese: 更新所有非微軟的防火牆和其它安全軟件在計算機上。

sentences.english: Setting up multi-level firewalls is one example of building a defense mechanism layer.
sentences.chinese: 建立多級防火牆是構建防禦機制層的一個例子。

sentences.english: The integration did not require any special firewall or security considerations.
sentences.chinese: 該集成不需要考慮任何防火牆或安全問題。

sentences.english: This is much more true if you are yourself firewalled or behind a router.
sentences.chinese: 這點會更加明顯當你處於路由器和防火牆之後時。
